name: Blue Haze
description: Daughter of a Blueberry indica and the original Haze, this slightly sativa-dominant hybrid is a versatile strain. It has a pleasing taste and scent, and its furry dense buds produce full-bodied effects. Blue Haze is a great candidate for the regular consumer’s arsenal as it is appropriate for a broad spectrum of activities and provides the optimal balance between cerebral and physical effects.

It has a pleasing taste and scent, and its furry dense buds produce full-bodied effects. Blue Haze is a great candidate for the regular consumer’s arsenal as it is appropriate for a broad spectrum of activities and provides the optimal balance between cerebral and physical effects.

articles.title: The Best Cannabis Strains for the Holidays (According to Leafly Reviewers)
articles.author: Brett Konen
articles.text:
The holidays are fast approaching, so naturally youâ€™re thinking about the perfect cannabis strains to enjoy over the upcoming weeks. Have innumerable aunts, uncles, in-laws, and second cousins coming into town for the long weekend? Youâ€™ll probably need something to chill you out after all that family time. Wanting to keep moving in spite of the weather? Youâ€™re after something active. Have about a thousand errands left to run? Something to spice up the process would be nice.
Luckily, Leafly user reviews are a gold mine of suggestions for cannabis strains that fit any scenario, so weâ€™ve compiled a few great user-sourced recommendations for a range of seasonal activities listed below. Whether youâ€™re grocery shopping, cocoa-sipping, or baking some cannabis-infused holiday cookies,Â try out one of the ideas below and enjoy your holiday celebrations!

For Coping with Winter
Â Â â€œThis is the perfect strain to make Seattle winter days productive! A couple hits gives my ambition, creativity and libido a jump-start.â€ â€“munin.raven
Â 
 â€œMy go to for getting my figure back after holiday indulgence!â€ â€“grngrazer
Â 
 â€œSmooth pull, great taste â€“ exactly what I hoped forâ€¦real killer high to cure the inevitable holiday blues.â€ â€“hazedandconfused
For Spending Time with Family & Friends
 â€œSmells like Christmas trees, tastes like pine and lightens the heart and mindâ€¦I found it made the whole holiday with ALL the family, very enjoyable. Oh and added benefits of not breaking ornaments or dropping the turkey.â€ â€“Free_Byrd
Â 
 â€œSmoked this with my Nana and great Uncle Pete while on winter vacationâ€¦Made me forget how much my back hurt from sleeping on an air mattress.â€ â€“somniumtextrix
Â 
 â€œA swift cerebral head high, accompanied by a punch of energy. Best used at a party with friends as is very good for getting you in the mood, to talk, dance, whatever!â€ â€“JustAnotherStoner
For Curling Up by the Fire
 â€œI could feel every atom in my body float away in rhythm with the space heater I was sitting next to. Perfect for sitting home on a cold winter evening and then getting a good night sleep.â€ â€“Anonymous
Â 
 â€œI enjoyed a blunt and hits from my vaporizer along side with a cup of hot chocolate, it was a great comboâ€¦pick it up for a stay-at-home type of day.â€ â€“kushconnoisseur420
Â 
 â€œIâ€™m washing it down with some seasonal ale and itâ€™s the perfect end to a perfect night.â€ â€“BudseyXO
Looks, Smells, and Tastes Like Christmas
 â€œWhen I opened the bag I thought I was suddenly on a camping trip. It smelled like a Christmas treeâ€¦The taste of pine, clove and earth danced across across my palate.â€ â€“robmacpheejr
Â 
 â€œNom nom nom like a Christmas tree with a lifesaver candy cane in your mouth.â€ â€“greedyguy
Â 
 â€œFeels like I threw a Christmas tree in a wood chipperâ€¦ lights, ornaments, candy canes â€“ everything â€“ and put it in my Pax to vape it.â€™â€ â€“Midnyte003
For Making Spirits Bright
 â€œThis is like that one â€˜bigâ€™ present hidden behind the tree just when you think you didnâ€™t get what you â€˜reallyâ€™ wanted that year. Itâ€™s that good.â€ â€“Anonymous
Â 
 â€œMy brain lit up like Times Square on New Years Eve.â€ â€“Grumple
Â 
 â€œThis strain had me smiling like the Grinch that stole Christmas.â€ â€“Skyclub
Â 
 â€œLike skating across a frozen lake surrounded by snowflakes in the night.â€ â€“ bugpowderdustmugwumpjism
Â 
 â€œBEST. STRAIN. EVER. Four for you, Sour D, you go Sour D.â€ â€“Anonymous
What are some of your favorite strains to enjoy over the holidays? Share in the comments!

articles.title: 10 Strain Pairings to Help You Celebrate Spring
articles.author: Kayla Williams
articles.text:
After a brutal winter that ravaged most of the United States, many of you are probably thrilled that the first day of spring is finally upon us. To celebrate the arrival of an extra hour of sunlight, blossoming flowers, and warmer weather, here are 10 strains that come in like a lion but stick with you like a lamb.
Peach Spice

Strain combination: Cotton Candy Kush and Green Queen

The sweet pear flavor in Cotton Candy Kush is balanced wonderfully by the spicy, nutty character of Green Queen.
Cherry Creamsicle

Strain combination: Vanilla Kush and Cherry Bomb

The heavier, smooth Vanilla Kush is beautifully complemented by the sweet cherry flavor of the lighter Cherry Bomb.
Strawberry Mojito

Strain combination: Strawberry Kush and Thin Mint

The unmistakable Thin Mint flavor and hybrid effects are perfectly balanced by the more physical Strawberry Kush.
Berry Tartlet

StrainÂ combination: Blackberry Kush and Lemon Haze

These two strong flavors coupled with contrasting effects provide a balanced, memorable experience.
Banana Brush

Strain combination: Banana Kush and Durban Poison

The distinct sweetness of Banana Kush could only be matched with an earthy, uplifting flower like Durban Poison.
Blue Bayou

Strain combination: Blue Cheese and Blue Haze

Blue cheese and peppered pear is the name of the game with these two acclaimed hybrids.
Waldorf

Strain combination: SAGEÂ and Island Sweet Skunk

The spicy sandalwood and earthy flavors of SAGE combined with Island Sweet Skunkâ€™s buttery apple taste creates a pairing reminiscent of a classic Waldorf salad.
Rubies â€˜n Roses

Strain combination: White Russian and Grapefruit

In a happy synthesis of citrus, floral, and earthy undertones, this pair provides a pleasant, invigorating lift.
Tropical Vacation

Strain combination: Pineapple Express and Cannalope Haze

Let this fruity coalescence of sweet pineapple, mango, and berry take you far, far away.
Chocolate Peel

Strain combination: Orange Kush and Chocolope

Orange and chocolate, with additional sweet and earthyÂ undertones, make this pair a no-brainer.
Photo credits: headerÂ strawberry mint, pear blue cheese, grapefruit, blackberry lemon, cherry vanilla, banana pine, chocolate orange, peach and spices, mango pineapple, apple sageÂ
